column5: Done:  From the rules: "Deleted or locked posts. If you disagree with a moderators decision to lock or delete a post, send them a Personal Message. DO NOT make a post complaining about it. We have opened the forums to children so we expect you to show them how adults should behave."  And:  "We'll keep it simple. Be nice and be respectful. Like your Mom probably told you, if you have nothing nice to say, then say nothing at all.  Debate is encouraged, but please follow the basic guidelines of debate. No name calling. Back up your claims with proof. Don't get your knickers in a knot if someone disagrees. KEEP IT CIVIL!  Things that will not be tolerated. Flaming, baiting, name calling, prejudice, racism, sexism, sexual comments and inuendos, swearing, spam, and general boorishness."    Op did not show a disagreement with a decision or complain about it. Someone may not have been happy about the post, and that must be part of the unwritten rules.

I didn't receive one PM about this. To the best of my knowledge, no mod received a PM regarding the thread. If a thread goes missing, it was taken out for a reason. PM the mod in question and if you don't know who it is,message the admin team. That's it.
did wfn ever remove it?
No, but OFC did....POOF !!
If you had read the rules, you would not have posted this.
And what's the dealio with your avatar?!?!
it was my five and four year old[at the time]playing around in the driveway.no children were hurt in the making of this picture
the rule i read said to pm an amin if you disagree with a locked or removed post.not sure if i do or not.may try to figure out how to send a pm or ...maybe just go fishhin
the first rule of fight club it we do not talk about fight club the second rule of fight club is we do not talk about fight club

i bet a lot more people would follow the ofc rules if they were applied consistent across the entire forum population.  i have only one question about the thread locking rule...how are you supposed to PM the admin that locked a thread when typically the admin that does so, does it under the veil of being anonymous?
Not all the mods lock annonymously, i know one who actually appologizes for having to do it.
who would i pm exactly?
exactly.
right
You could PM the entire Admin/Mod team with a single PM, just saying.
the few times i did pm to ask, i was punished for it.  just saying.
Well if everyone was familiar with the forum rules and posted with respect to them, we wouldn't even need Mods.  "Just saying."
Hey Mod,I finaly noticed your pin is low on line. Cant be good for loooooooooooong casts? Just saying.
geez
If it's lock, it's lock, if it's removed, it's removed....move on.....
He asked if WFN removed it.
Ask WFN then.
I missed that in the rules.
OP's question was  what happend to musky /wfn thread? Sorry, that's how it was spelled. Now read the rules.
